product_name: Tifosi Veloce Fototec Photochromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Tifosi Veloce Fototec(TM) Photochromic sunglasses boast a wide light transmission range, automatically adjusting the tint so you can keep performing without interruption. Fototec lenses automatically adjust tint according to light conditions; lenses darken in bright light and lighten in dim conditions. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact-resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to help eliminate fogging. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit, flexibility and impact resistance in all temperatures. Hydrophilic rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. Interchangeable design allows you to swap out lenses when the lighting changes (additional lenses not included). Fits small to large faces. Tifosi Veloce Fototec Photochromic sunglasses include a semirigid zippered storage case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Tifosi Veloce Fototec(TM) Photochromic sunglasses boast a wide light transmission range, automatically adjusting the tint so you can keep performing without interruption.
